Matchups.Flavourtext: Valeans are training hard to protect their Village and Secrets. As a young adept, you are walking in their Footsteps.
A light Storm is coming up, watch out for critters coming forward.
The storm gets harsher, more critters attack.
Bats Bats Bats
Did you eat something funny? Why are the Mushroom walking!?
Watch out! A boulder is falling from Mount Aleph! You need to dodge it!
The storm appears to calm down, but a few critters are still roaming around.
You spend the night at the towns inn. You contemplate what an interesting world you're living in and are excited to explore as much of it as possible.

Sol Sanctum.Name: Sol Sanctum
Sol Sanctum.FlavourText: The holy grounds above Vale. Watch out for falling rocks.

Matchups.FlavourText: The entrance of the Sanctuary is massive and impressive. You enter cautiously...
As the hallway lights up, some monsters get scared and jump forward
As you solve the puzzles, you find some empty rooms. Well, not *completely* empty, anyways.
You reach a very distinct room. You have heard about that. You see a bunch of statues, but you can only move one. Which one will it be?
You have solved the puzzle, you have reached the Star Chamber! Congratulations. Some nasty looking monsters are looking at you from afar, it would be better to turn back now than never!

Star Chamber.name: Star Chamber
Star Chamber.FlavourText: The mysterious star chamber. Watchout, it's slippery!

Matchups.Flavourtext: What is going on? The Star Chamber appears to be alive! Watchout! Run!
That was close. Look! The guardians of the elemental stars are noticing you!
It appears there's more going on than usual, what is happening? The creatues living in the water are climbing up to you.
You see more djinn in the distance. They appear to be approaching you! Wait a minute, those aren't djinn, they're more of these balls!

From what appears to be water down below, a silhouette can me made out. 'I am the guardian of water. Well, his apprentice. And you have been busting my balls all day, so I'm slowly starting to get fed up'

Vale Cave.Name: Vale Cave

Matchups.FlavourText: A bear is in the cave. I hope you're not surprised.
Wipe off the hair, let's go!
The cave is getting darker and danker..
*We need to go deeper*
The cave is getting spooky. You can see a yellow stone glimmering in the back.
Oh hey! I guess it was worth it after all! Now let's quickly exit this creepy place...

Vale Cave.FlavourText: Hidden behind Kraden's Cottage, there is a small cave. Whatever might be in there?

Vault.Name: Vault
Vault.FlavourText: A theft has been committed in Vault, who's the culprit?

Matchups.FlavourText: It looks like that Slime gulped something! A stolen item perhaps?
Your investigations lead you to the cemetary. Wait, is that grave moving? Oh no...
The Skeleton's bones have attracted a dog... and wolves! Protect the pup!
Thankful for saving him, the dog leads you to the inn's attic where you find the stolen goods! You hear the thieves coming, it's time to face them!

Goma Cave.name: Goma Cave
Goma Cave.FlavourText: A cave allowing you to pass through the Goma Range

Matchups.Flavourtext: Is This the lost head of Dullahan?
Bats?! In a cave?! No way! And you don't have Repels...
As you advance further in the obscurity, you hear sinister laments.
The way out is near. But before enjoying the sun again, you encounter a Djinni. Catch it!
As you walk north along the coast of Angara, you are certain to pass this. What's this, the Queen of Rats or what?
In the distance you see some trees, but as you approach you realize that it's a town. It's surpringly calm and a bit overgrown. The perfect place for a Venus Djinni!
There was not much going in the town, so you head out. Further north, you spot a forest you want to check out.
Some bees swarming around, totally normal.
Woops, something between the trees is moving. Totally normal, after all you've been rolling around logs all day.
The forest is getting deeper and deeper, take care you don't get lost. Unlike these guys, who were eaten by a troll.
Dusk is setting in. Either you find the way out now or try to survive the night.
A respectable first fight, yet you sigh upon recalling the great size of Tret.
First there was the forest, now there's this tree maze, too.
Since they were born, they've been stayin' alive
After some searching around a while, you find a room with a table of spiders playing cards, they immediately notice you, uh oh...
You take the first exit you see, which surprisingly leads to a Jupiter Djinni. However, he's in a bad mood so wants to battle.
You return to the third floor and notice some shadows in the corner, What is it? CREEPER! Aw man....
As you are about to check the chest in the room, a troll enters the room
As you are about to check the chest AGAIN, more trolls enter the room. Someone likes to troll you.
You have had enough of this tree. You want to end this, so you jump down the middle of the tree. To your surprise, you found what you were looking for: Tret

Tolbi.Name: Tolbi

Matchups.FlavourText: Aaah, the glorious city of tolbi. You have heard a lot about it and you head straight to the famous fountain to try your luck. As you approach, you see that it is full of monsters...
While fighting those monsters, you saw a glowing shadow slipping by a house. You decide to follow it. Wait, a glowing shadow? That doesn't make any.. whooah, it's a Djinni
As you come back to the main square, you witness some thugs trying to steal a poor merchants cob of corn. You must step in.

Sigh.. The commotion has alarmed the guards. You just wanted to help, right? You have destroyed the whole market and burned down half a house, but noone could have seen that coming, right? ......Right?

The guards tell you that you are under arrest. They can't bring you there themselves, because they're injured too much, but give you the directions. On the way there you walk by some gladiators training. Let's say hello!
You're done with this city. Too big, too strange. You start exploring the outskirts.
The sky becomes overcast and something hard hits your head.
Before the weather gets worse, you take shelter in a nearby cave.
You realized that you are just walking around Karagol Sea. Let's head in the other direction.

As you cross over to the continent of Gondowan, you face a desert. Realizing that is going to be hot and that you won't be able to stop sweating, you wish you'd brought a change of clothes. Back to Tolbi, for now.

Tolbi.FlavourText: On the south side of Karagol sea lies the huge city of Tolbi under the leadership, or *regime* as it's told, of Babi. What might be his secrets? The town is full of tourists, merchants, soldiers, ... It looks like they are getting ready for an event!

Colosso Trials.name: Colosso Trials
Colosso Trials.FlavourText: The Colosso tournament is the biggest event across Weyard. Warriors from all over the world are trying to compete in the tournament. Beat the trials, and you might have a shot as the finalist.

Matchups.Flavourtext: Round 1: You're up against Buford. He looks threatening in his black armor, yet you can feel his fear deep inside.
Round 2: Dekka must win the finals. Dekka. Dekka.
Round 3: Don't let Navampa's pink armor deceive you, because this warrior is much stronger than he looks like.. Good luck!
Round 4: Satrage, the fourth Warrior. You watched him meditate before battle. He is prepared for you.
Round 5: Galahads name incites the stories of the fabled knight of the round table, but by the clanking of Galahads armor, you *know* that he is more afraid of you, than you are of him.
Round 6: Azart trusts noone. You saw him in the audience of the previous battles, he watched you every move. Careful, and good luck.

Round 7: The final round of the trials. So far you have done well, but here comes your toughest opponent. Morgan, and his energy is ahead of him. He strikes powerfully, let's hope you can find his weakness.

Colosso Finals.name: Colosso Finals
Colosso Finals.FlavourText: You have made the finals! Contrary to previous year, you are asked to not just use your muscles, but also your head.

Matchups.Flavourtext: The Warriors of Vale once saved Weyard from dying. Who is the oldest valian Hero? (Isaac, Garet, Felix or Piers)
Your first fight in the finals, Azart. Good luck!
Which Item protects its wearer from the effects of the curse effect? Spirit Ring, Priest Ring, Clerics Ring, Guardian Ring
Satrage glances at you through the slits of his helmet. Good luck!
Which Shoot
The final fight until you win the tournament! A fiery Navampa charges at you. Pull through!

What's that, another story? Take a breath, think about this! You are facing four puppets dressed as Gladiators with nametags on them. Which is none of the competing Gladiators? Isaac, Buford, Dekka, x?
Oh no. The rumors were true! A fourth fight! An unknown warrior, masked and cloaked. You sense psynergy, watch out.
